lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to make an adequate living for them and their children, but need a helping hand to get started!

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because:
"I do not believe one can settle how much we ought to give.... I am afraid the only safe rule is to give more than we can spare. If our charities do not at all pinch or hamper us, I should say they are too small. There ought to be things we should like to do and cannot do because our charities expenditure excludes them."

-C.S. Lewis

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in business. Want to change the world? Educate a girl.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: People helping people is the way to Peace on Earth.

lenders.name: jim
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is direct and personal.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I can. Why not help someone in need?
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant.

lenders.name: Irina
lenders.occupation: Serial Fashion Entrepreneur, CEO of aXXa
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be entrepreneur
lenders.occupational_info: Creating new fashion baseball caps for the youth.

lenders.name: Gibby
lenders.loan_because:
Please join Team AccuScore!  Kiva and other groups have and will continue to truly change the world by fostering independence and self reliance via microfinance.

Entrepreneurship is not defined by any economic means but by one’s spirit. There is no difference between Kiva entrepreneurs and venture-backed dot-coms. As fellow entrepreneurs, AccuScore supports the entrepreneurial spirit of any size, in any land.

PLEASE CLICK THE LINK BELOW TO JOIN TEAM ACCUSCORE!!

lenders.name: Lora
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and families that need this money more than I do.  ♥

lenders.name: John & Lois
lenders.loan_because: We hope to help people be able to help themself and their family .
lenders.occupational_info: We work several jobs in order to raise enough revenue to fund ministry in 3 small rural independent churches. We re-opened the churches that had been previously closed by large Christian denominations due to declining population. We have learned through the success of these small churches that all things are possible through God.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: By American standards, I am barely middle class. By world standards, I am really wealthy.  I want to share my good fortune with others to help make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to copy edit manuscripts for publication, including manuscripts for professional journals, dissertations, and textbooks. I am now retired and enjoy every minute of every day.

lenders.name: Shannon, Peter, Berkeley
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop curriculum for trade schools.  My husband makes people feel better by having them lift weights and exercise. Berkeley brings joy to our lives by just being a dog and doing what dogs do.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to the world and small amounts of money can make a major difference in the developing world.  "We are All One" in humanity and this is a great expression of that Unity!
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Scientist

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me. Now it's my turn to help those less fortunate than I.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: We, as a people have lost a sense of compassion and kindness in the world. We can advance as a race more efficiently if we just learn to co-exist. Where is our humanity?

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are trying in spite of obstacles to make a place for themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Now I am a volunteer in my community trying to payback for all the luck I have had

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others achieve success and believe self-sufficient people are our best hope for peace around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs get their companies to where they need to be to ensure success.

lenders.name: Bill and Gina
lenders.loan_because: We must become the change we wish to see - Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: Creating new medicines for unmet medical needs

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva lets me help in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I would install or fix complex machines.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: We are all a part of a global family - sharing my resources with the members of this family.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing spiritual resources and support to prison inmates.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to loan and it makes so much sense.

lenders.name: brooke
lenders.loan_because: i love to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: i am a student studying cosmetology.

lenders.name: julie
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the right thing to do.  I'm lucky enough to be in a position to help others and am happy that I can help grow new businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make movies

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a University.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: by connecting one on one with others who share our goal to change the world for the better we will make a difference.

lenders.name: greenboogers
lenders.occupation: Your going to die soon, get in the game
lenders.loan_because: If it feels good do it.

lenders.name: Tabitha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in an interdependent world. I believe in passing forward the help that has been given to me and I believe that if we all helped each other out this way, our world will greatly improve.
lenders.occupational_info: I create websites and help market people and companies. I am also creating a website to support artists as well.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my own life to have the opportunities that an economically secure foundation and family provide. I realize most people are not born with such advantages.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and study history so that I can better understand world affairs past and present. I hope to help the next generation to do the same. If we help to generate understanding and compassion towards the people of the world in the younger generation, we will have a more hopeful tomorrow.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I live in a part of the world with great surplus of resources.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeff is an entertainer and filmmaker.

lenders.occupational_info: Facing computer monitors 10+hrs a day and think about everything.

lenders.occupational_info: I am working now in Saudi Arabia, and i am thinking to go back to my country – Jordan to state my business

lenders.name: Sanne Østergaard
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others in need, and I like the whole concept of offering people a loan without interests. The fact that I know who I'm lending my money to makes me want to get more involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a medical student i Denmark - in two years I will have finished my education and I will be a real doctor.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to help people at my company get their work done. I also run a side business selling fine china that I purchase at auction.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I believe many people could make great improvements in their own and others' lives if they just had a little bit of money to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the American embassy and try to help Americans and those from other countries to better understand each other.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I care about sustainability and small scale changes to create larger improvements.  A single small venture can by a catalyst for greater improvements in the local scene and have a disproportionally high impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I focus on sustainability and conservation of the environment, specifically in cooperation with human needs.

lenders.name: Deta Program
lenders.occupational_info: This is a group of high school students who work together to raise money for non-profit agencies.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: It feels right.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government making sure that businesses honor their promises to employees in regards to pensions.

lenders.name: Carollee
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for it.  I think it is a great idea!

lenders.name: Loren
lenders.loan_because: I think that sustainable development is the more important way that we can help developing countries thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization whose sole mission is preventing child abuse.  My job is to raise funds for our programming and managing projects and special events.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to change the world.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I direct people and create images that help make your product or services better looking.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I believe that individuals are the most powerful agents for change and that those of us who have been financially successful can empower those with fewer resources to create that change.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently retired from a corporate job and am using my time and skills to help non-profits achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Earth
lenders.loan_because: One earth, one dream.

lenders.name: Abu
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who are really in need as one day I may also happen to be in their shoes.  Helping others is one small way of thanking God for giving us His bounties.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I want to be of service.  I want to make someone's life better.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and make computer software :)

lenders.loan_because: I hope to help talented and self-motivated entrepreneurs get an extra boost to make their dreams of serving others and supporting their families a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I retouch photos. That is, my studio makes photos look better for advertising agencies, publishers and photographers. This includes fixing damaged photos for individuals. We also teach it for those who  like to do it themselves.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and it is the most satisfying thing anyone can do with money.  This is my very small way of sharing and I hope it helps these ambitious folks.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired purchasing agent

lenders.name: Arin
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: James & Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I was initially impressed by Kiva's vision to promote sustainable development by loaning rather than donating, thus creating a culture of individual responsibility and accountability.  I have a been a member for a few years now, and all of my loans have been repaid in full - as a result we continue to increase our outstanding commitment with each repayment!

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women in other countries develop businesses to benefit themselves and their families

lenders.name: van Dongen
lenders.loan_because: We want to encourage entrepreneurship in economically developing communities, and micro-lending provides the means and the hope for economic development, one family at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Family Physician

lenders.name: Kirstin
lenders.loan_because: It is such a simple thing to do which can make a positive impact on someone else's life. I think it is a wonderful system and love that I can continue to reloan the money I have invested.

lenders.occupational_info: I help disabled people find out what jobs they can perform.

lenders.name: Loesken
lenders.loan_because: I was able to get loans for myself which allowed me to set up my own business, which became succesful.

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.name: rebecca & alain
lenders.loan_because: we like to help people who help others.
lenders.occupational_info: rebecca is in wine sales and alain is a director of a small business.

lenders.name: Todd

We believe in supporting those who are trying their hardest to improve their lives and environment.   Kiva provides a wonderful avenue for us to provide help to others who are trying to achieve the same,   Thanks Kiva!!

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I respect the hopes and dreams of people everywhere, and to show my deep gratitude for the opportunity to pursue my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I sing early music (composed before 1750) with a group of wonderful friends.  We are called The Rose Ensemble.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and make them happy.

lenders.name: Celia
lenders.loan_because: "when the power of love overcomes the love of power - then we will know peace"

lenders.loan_because: We all should do at least a little bit.

lenders.name: Annette

lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer in a small town in Virginia, USA.

lenders.name: Cheri

lenders.name: Jim and Susan

lenders.occupational_info: We teach American college students and try to make them better citizens of the world.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe those that can help, should help.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers

lenders.name: August & Cliff
lenders.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help people start businesses who might otherwise not have been able to get going.

lenders.name: Peg

lenders.occupational_info: Before retiring I directed a program at University of Wisconsin-Madison that introduced new students (and their parents) to the university and helped them make the transition from high school to college.

lenders.name: Mercedes
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to help other people who are willing to help themself...But more than anything I want to know who I am helping,  Giving some money to charity is fine, but this way I believe I make a more direct impact in somebody's life.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: it's the easy, right thing to do.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: Even in my abundant life, there have been times when a small loan and someone's belief in me made all the difference.  I want to share that gift of belief and the goodness I experience in my life - doing my part to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach about the beauty and power of therapeutic essential oils - empowering others to use nature's own medicine cabinet for better physical and emotional well being.

lenders.name: Ronke
lenders.loan_because: We are all interconnected. Imagine how beautiful and happy the world would be if we all enjoy abundance. Utopia is attainable - with higher consciousness. I'm proud of all Kiva lenders for redefining the term 'neighborliness'

lenders.name: JoAnn
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy!

lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I believe in the idea of lending some of my resources on a small scale to enable another person to create their own wealth and thereby dramatically improve their living conditions in a sustainable way.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to run a company which designs microchips.

lenders.name: Sergio
lenders.loan_because: I care about hard working people. We have to help each other.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: poco a poco

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: Because I can, I should.  And it makes me feel good to help someone across the world, particularly where Americans are not so popular right now.  I'm glad Kiva provides the chance to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help make the American legal system work the way it should.  I work for the government with their system to provide healthcare and wages for workers who have been hurt on the job.

lenders.name: Vidura Barrios

lenders.name: Chris & Kristen
lenders.loan_because:
Leviticus 25:35-37
" 'If one of your countrymen becomes poor and is unable to support himself among you, help him as you would an alien or a temporary resident, so he can continue to live among you.  Do not take interest of any kind from him, but fear your God, so that your countryman may continue to live among you. You must not lend him money at interest or sell him food at a profit.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a graduate student and an employee of a company that manages apartments.

lenders.name: MaryAnn
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur (www.BusinessPlanMaster.com and www.CaliforniaRendezvous.com ) and former Peace Corps volunteer, I appreciate the skills that entrepreneurs bring, from all over the world.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am a world traveller and have always felt strongly about giving back to the global community, especially in direct concrete ways. I am a huge advocate of thinking globally and acting locally and hope to do what little I can to contribute to a better world for us all.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a University. My classes are about food, development, and culture. I also work with farmers in Central America to help them gain secure rights to their land.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: Small loans are the best way to stimulate small businesses.

lenders.name: Mohamed
lenders.loan_because:
I want recover from my financial problem. However, My Parents got a loan from the landlord for high rate intrest for our house construction. 

As i am an elder son, its my responsibility to repay the loan. so that i came to Saudi Arabia to earn money to repay my loan as well as to fullfil my dreams as to run the Social work organization. 

Besides, I am gaining Rs.20000 per month and i have been paid Rs.5000/month. Since last two years i am paying intrest only and i could not save the money because i want to send money to my parents, my wife and for my personal expense.

I could not return to india since my financial barrier.
lenders.occupational_info:
If i got a loan from Kiva.org. i will be repay my loan and i can save Rs.5000/month which will be easy to repay my loan.

Eventhough, its out of kivo.org's scop i apply for my individual growth towards to uplift deprived people.

lenders.name: Benny, Gem, Edi & Diesel
lenders.loan_because: My father helped me become involved with Kiva, he has shared his passion of caring for others with me. I am so greatful to be able to help others in this way! Thanks Dad!
lenders.occupational_info: Caring for sick children in Hospital

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Ann

I want to give people an opportunity to create a better living. It could have been my family, if I was born elsewhere...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working with development & humanitarian aid, for a Swedish organization, based in Uppsala.The organization supports some microfinance projects, via the partner organizations in different countries around the world. Besides that it is also supporting development projects and humanitarian work.

lenders.loan_because:
I have had lots of loans so I thought I should share with people who need credit more than I do. The best reason to borrow money is to invest it.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: I loan because Kiva helps people help themselves.   I loan because Kiva does not take any overhead & I know exactly where my money is going.  I loan because I'm helping small businesses grow in a time when big business is taking over everywhere and making it hard for small farmers or storeowners.  I loan because $25 is a negligible deduction from my life and a huge impact on others'.  I loan because as the loans are repaid I will be able to reuse that money to loan more and more each year.
lenders.occupational_info: I head the interior design team for a company that manufacturers luxury houseboats.

lenders.name: Prof. Dr.
lenders.loan_because: The only way for people (and families, villages, and countries) to survive and increase their standard of living is to have access to and build upon capital. The NY Times bestselling book The End of Poverty by Jeffrey Sachs is must reading for everyone who is interested in Kiva, microlending, or helping others in the "third world." Kiva members: please be aware that only supporting microfinance as the sole solution for ending extreme poverty is wrong. Without extended directed humanitarian relief (such as health care, food, etc) and foreign support for public investment (in health care, education, family planning, infrastructure, administration, etc) microlending can only have limited effectiveness and the poverty trap CANNOT BE BROKEN. Urge your elected officials to actually fund the commitments that the US and many other countries have made to the Millenium Development Goals (MDG)! See: http://devdata.worldbank.org/atlas-mdg/ for MDG data. Hans Rosling on development (AV presentations): http://www.ted.com/index.php/talks/view/id/92 http://www.ted.com/index.php/talks/view/id/140 Jeffrey Sachs (audio lectures): http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/reith2007/ There are opportunities and dilemmas in providing access to capital. In many situations, providing capital (tools and opportunities) can be wonderful; in other situations counterproductive. For example, providing loans for someone to sell an imported good that is unhealthy for the local population and environmentally unsound is ethically troublesome (cigarettes are the perfect example). I hope Kiva and its partners will acknowledge, learn about, and discuss these issues and not try to ignore them. Microlending is in its early stages and still needs research and development to further its helpfulness and sophistication. Funding individuals and organizations through Kiva helps establish the cycle that allows everyone (lenders, lending intermediaries, and borrowers) to learn, build, and learn again to find the right methods and opportunities to create healthful and sustainable change. "Capital as such is not evil; it is its wrong use that is evil. Capital in some form or other will always be needed." Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info:
--teaching the next generation
--researching to increase our knowledge

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I do a lot of volunteer work with disadvantaged families here in Phoenix, and this gives me a chance to do something on a more "global" scale--but still within my own means! What a great concept. I am presently reading "Banker to the Poor" by Muhammad Yunus, Founder of Grameen Bank; if you want a true inspiration, read this book!!
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories for the local, community newspaper. It is free to the people who live in the community, and comes out once a month.

I loan because God loves me. I loan because it pleases God, the creator of all things, the one true God, who sent His only son to die for my sins. It is with great gratitude and thankfulness that I do the will of God according to the Bible; HIS word alone. 

1 John 3:17 
James 2:15-16
Deut 15:7
Deut 15:11
Matthew 19:21 
Matthew 25:35 
Luke 12:33 
Luke 18:22 
And about 100 other passages from my King James Bible.

When I'm not there, I am a writer, African storyteller and artist. In the picture above I am telling African stories to second graders in a primary school. Being a professional storyteller means I get paid to tell tales. I do this for schools, churches, libraries, museums and companies.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva really highlights what helping others is about.  Anyone can give random people $25-50 and go on with life having the "I did something nice" feeling, but loaning through Kiva goes deeper than that; it is a chance to learn about how others live throughout the world and potentially make a friend.  10 years ago, a person would need to take time off work and a trip around the world to experience what Kiva offers to both the recipient and lender.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of women of different faiths who want to work for peace and justice in the world.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop computer software that helps electric power companies plan and design new electric systems and analyze and maintain existing systems.

lenders.name: Dave & Tammy
lenders.loan_because: we believe the world can be changed if we would only share the excess we have.  We should be ashamed when we have an extra bedroom and there are yet homeless people in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair computers and administer networks for small companies.

lenders.name: Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: “Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today.  Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”—Author unknown  These people are an inspiration-what a simple thing I can do to give back to the world to make it a better place.  We all need friends to help us out from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work doing visual design and styling for businesses, photographers and cinematographers.  I setup displays with mannequins, props, signage and also buy clothes and props for film and photo shoots.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: We are all one, a beautiful tapestry of hearts and souls, and we must help one another be the best we can be while on our planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help others respect, value and treat one another with dignity by opening up dialogue about intercultural nuances and how to resolve interpersonal and community conflict  so as to create a more  connected, peaceful world.

lenders.name: Camilo
lenders.loan_because: Giving money to someone is in most cases damaging to them. It doesn't teach them anything or provide an incentive to work. A microloan is the best way to lift someone from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychology professor.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I'm a quarter Ukranian, so want to lend there.   Im a neighbor to Mexico, so want to lend there.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful.
lenders.occupational_info: Involved in: environmental policy, pesticide policy, development.

lenders.name: Randy & Leigh
lenders.loan_because: I have tried and can't think of a better way for the folks in the entire world who have a little extra to help the folks who are in need without charity but with caring and respect! Wow!
lenders.occupational_info: Leigh and I are entrepreneurs to the core. We have had several businesses and have been helped with loans when we needed them. Now it is our turn to help!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: all hard-working men deserve the means to blossom in their field of dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to refugees and give tours for school children at the museum of fine arts.

lenders.name: gaviian group
lenders.loan_because: we want to assist women who have started small busineses to better support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a small group of women (14) in Anchorage, Alaska, who have been investing together in an investment club for over ten years. We have recently decided to join Kiva to make loans to women who want to expand their small businesses.

lenders.name: Gary Monkey
lenders.loan_because: cats look out for each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep my owners happy by looking cute and purring.  They are a teacher and a paramedic.

lenders.name: Devon
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by the program, and see a better future coming from these interactions.  Kiva has been a light to so many, and it is amazing to realize the influence of the organization.

lenders.name: Clifton
lenders.loan_because: I think that those of us who are able to help have a responsibility to help those in need.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea to help people that want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I Buy and sell houses and teach others how to invest in real estate

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is one of the most  effective mechanisms for helping people lift themselves up financially.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of people who arrange insurance for aircraft.

lenders.name: pamela
lenders.loan_because: I don't know - it seems to be the right thing to do, to help people try to help themselves. One thing I learned in social work is about a client's right to self determination - but we also recognize that sometimes people need the tools in order to function independently. I think this kind of organization provides people with the tools to determine their own future without being dependent.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with patients and their families to plan for a safe return to home, provide emotional support and referrals to community agencies.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I make cookies and cupcakes for people I love.

lenders.name: Dorin & Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful feeling to know that we can help others less fortunate.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people prosper on their own. People who want to better themselves through hard work and imagination are making this a better world for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people buy things. Thank you for reading this.      :-)

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: After traveling around the globe, I realize how such a small amount of money can result in a large amount of change.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I am

lenders.name: Rae & Mark
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people to help themselves and their communities.  As a non-profit organisation, we understand the need for working capital to help grow your business.
lenders.occupational_info: We ship life-saving, herbal-based pet products around the world. Our highly effective main product prevents and treats the Canine Parvovirus.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I like to feel that I am contributing to the growth and well-being of another.

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with wonderful, challenged children

lenders.name: Cristy
lenders.loan_because: Regardless of where you are or what you do we are all connected. The world is our community. We are honored to give a neighbor a helping hand.

lenders.name: Thom
lenders.loan_because:
I was helped by friends when I was younger. I think it is now time for me to do the same for others.
I am so overwhelmed by the Kindness I feel when logged on to Kiva, I just know I must help...
I enjoy seeing others that are helping and I wish more would tell about themselves. It's ok, it is being part of the Kiva family...
lenders.occupational_info: In my retirement I am the webmaster of an internet website on my favorite subject... The Outdoors... Visit with Us...

lenders.name: Vernon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping when I can, and the Gospel tells us to love our neighbors as ourselves.  We can all help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired chemical engineer and businessman

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: sharing is caring

lenders.name: mattandjohn
lenders.loan_because: i machine
lenders.occupational_info: we make small plastic pieces to help science

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: We should do all we can to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze medical data to track disease progression

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: we can all make a difference no matter how big or small.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: God has given me everything and entrusted me with a little extra to give joyfully.

lenders.name: Tomas
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happier and I hope it makes others happier too.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to build a small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in information technology, and application development. So basically I am a computer geek.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I believe God calls us all to share what we have with those that need. Kiva is a safe practical and resourceful way to meet that call.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage Information Systems projects for Healthcare Organizations.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I am a former TV journalist who has reported from many developing nations. I have seen first hand the need for loans like these. Kiva makes sense for the lender - and more importantly it helps the borrower succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the renewable energy business, developing ways to replace the use of petroleum.  I care about the dignity of work and the dignity of every person on earth.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy that I can help people all around the world.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: God loves the world and I believe this can help show that love to people willing to work hard and better the lives of themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Eric & Mariam
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful example for my baby girl.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I run a small business and had to start with very little help.  Also, as a follower of Eckankar, I know that good energy multiplies and spreads to all when people take control and responsibility for their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with sick and also healthy people to build their health in a natural manner without drugs or surgery.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: "Whatsoever you do to the least of my brothers, that you do unto me." Life goes by in the twinkling of an eye.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an owner of a beauty salon, where we do haircuts, perms, color , skin care, makeup and nails.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I study God and mankind relationship with God.

lenders.name: Iain
lenders.loan_because: I've seen first hand the benefits of micro-financing in a number of developing nations.  The traditional banking system has failed the small entrepreneur - in some countries their interest rates exceed 100% - usury to say the least. Microfinancing puts people in different nations closed together helping with world understanding.

lenders.name: Jared
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 12 years old and am in Grade 7.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: We can't reach or help provide a chance to everyone who needs it, but through Kiva, we can reach some.
lenders.occupational_info: I created, improved, and/or mucked about with computer systems.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good.  I get my friends and family to do it by setting an example.  I use open source programs that don't accept donations, but ask you to donate on their behalf (BitPim this is for you).
lenders.occupational_info: I setup and build computer networks.  I also build optical chips for computers.  By degree  I am a mechanical engineer and particularly interested in bringing clean water everyone in the world.

lenders.name: Lexie
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in need, and I know how grateful I've been to receive help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother of one. Every mother knows my work! =)

lenders.name: barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to follow their dreams.

lenders.name: Walt
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people in less privileged economies than the US have a chance at a better life

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: the money I loan will be of use to needy people many times over (rather than through one time gifts).  I like the idea of being able to see how people use the funds to better their lives and help their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: i make sure that my company's internet websites are up and running on a 24x7 basis.

lenders.name: dsjglobel
lenders.loan_because: it makes one feel good to help others realize their dream.this in turn helps me realize my own.one would never think so little could go so far!
lenders.occupational_info: i protect the u.s and other military  by providing security  to post and employees.

lenders.name: Dottie
lenders.loan_because: Making a difference makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Cara
lenders.loan_because: I, myself, am a small buisness owner.  We all need to start somewhere...

lenders.name: Athena Ivan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become self-sufficient and productive members of their societies.

lenders.name: Sid
lenders.loan_because: We all need to work together to balance our world and this program could help.  I want all peoples to have options and enjoy good lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work hard and long, but I am able to support myself and family well.

lenders.name: Sabine
lenders.loan_because: This is such an easy way to help change the world by helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Steve & Jeanne
lenders.occupation: Sr. Product Mgr and Stay-at-Home Mom
lenders.loan_because: it just makes sense!
lenders.occupational_info: Jeanne-I cook, I clean, I play, I wipe noses and other parts, I do laundry - lots of laundry.  That about sums it up.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back
lenders.occupational_info: Writer

lenders.name: Tally
lenders.loan_because: I'm incredibly blessed and I want to help others.  I hold to the belief that God wants us to be more of a highway than a cul-de-sac when it comes to resources he places in our hands.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a Christian Pastor of a church.  

While conservative in our theology we are liberal in our methodology and we believe one of the greatest failures in the church as a whole has been the lack of care for the weak.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I care about people, but I detest most traditional left wing causes that I see as economically infeasible.  This project gives me a chance to help people in a way that will advance their long term wellbeing.

lenders.name: Ami
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Educator

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Now we can think globally, act locally, and act globally.  It is our job as citizens of the richest nation in the world to fill the gap left by our government in sharing an appropriate portion of our wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: Opening the minds of teenagers to the power they have in changing the world.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a law student.

lenders.name: Mans
lenders.loan_because: To nurture the entrepreneurial spirit!

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people to feel good, to be happy and to become the person they choose to be.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: A 2006 trip to China showed me how much I have in common even with people who look and live much different than I.  This heightened empathy motivates me to do my small part to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a history teacher.  I also teach martial arts (Kung Fu).

lenders.name: mohad
lenders.loan_because: for help all poor people that is my life
